Option to autofill image size
.
![lena]( test/img/lena.bmp )
.
<p><img src="test/img/lena.bmp" alt="lena" width="128" height="128" style="width:128px;height:128px;"></p>
.
.
![lena]( test/img/lena.bmp =200x )
.
<p><img src="test/img/lena.bmp" alt="lena" width="200" style="width:200px;"></p>
.


Ignore invalid pass
.
